title: Mango and lime fool

default: ½ mango, skin and stone removed, chopped
1 tbsp honey, plus extra for drizzling
½ lime, juice and zest only
lime wedges and fresh mint sprigs, to garnish

steps: In a small bowl, mix together the chopped mango, whipped cream, honey, lime juice and zest and spoon into a serving glass. Garnish with an extra drizzle of honey, lime wedges and mint sprigs.
